title: Governor Chris Christie Orders Flags Lowered to Half-Staff in Honor of Fallen United States Army ...
text: ( Source : The Office of the Governor of the State of New Jersey ) Trenton, NJ - Today , Governor Chris Christie signed the following Executive Order : - Ordering all State buildings to fly flags at half-staff on Wednesday, October 21 , 2015 , in
